HDG.FS.content: “philosophy” today behind science, misses 2 sole realities of today: 1) development of business (der wirtschaftlichen Entwicklung) 2) correlated armament (Rüstung) [Marxism knows these realities]

HDG.FS.content: Marxism as a whole rests on this thesis [from Early Writings]: “to be radical is to grasp the root of the matter, but for man the root is man himself,” thinks on the basis of production: social production of society, self-production of human being as social being > Marxism is thought of today, where self-production of man & society prevail [isn’t Nietzsche & Hegel also thought of today?] > self-production (Selbstherstellung) raises danger (Gefahr) of self-destruction (Selbstzerstörung)

HDG.FS.content: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? Marxism & sociology name the “imperatives”—to which we are compelled today > Heidegger gathers then in name Ge-stell, most extreme form of history of metaphysics, of the destiny of being, from epoch of objectivity to orderability, no longer objects only “consumer goods” at disposal of every consumer [w/out objectivity, is there no more consciousness?]
